subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Coach John Tortorella said the Rangers were not affected psychologically by their 0-3 record in overtime this postseason, including a 3-2 loss to the Bruins on Thursday.
snippet: Coach John Tortorella said the Rangers were not affected psychologically by their 0-3 record in overtime this postseason, including a 3-2 loss to the Bruins on Thursday.
